statements: UPDATE social_media_referrals SET click_count = 100, share_count = 50 WHERE id = 1
UPDATE social_media_referrals SET share_count = 75, click_count = 120 WHERE id = 2
UPDATE social_media_referrals SET click_count = click_count + 1, share_count = share_count + 1 WHERE id = 1
UPDATE social_media_referrals SET link = 'http://example.com', click_count = click_count + 5 WHERE share_count > 10
UPDATE referral_links SET clicks = clicks + 1 WHERE referral_id = 1;
UPDATE click_tracking SET user_id = 1001, timestamp = '2022-01-01 08:00:00' WHERE click_id = 10;
UPDATE referral_links SET clicks = clicks + 1, shares = 5 WHERE referral_id = 1;
UPDATE click_tracking SET user_id = 100, timestamp = NOW() WHERE click_id = 5;
UPDATE links SET click_count = click_count + 1 WHERE link_id = 1001;
UPDATE users SET email = 'newemail@example.com' WHERE user_id = 500;
UPDATE links SET click_count = click_count + 1, share_count = share_count - 1 WHERE link_id = 100;
UPDATE clicks SET timestamp = '2022-01-01 08:00:00' WHERE click_id = 500;
UPDATE social_media_referrals SET shares = 10, link_clicks = 50 WHERE referral_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
UPDATE users SET email = 'john.doe@example.com' WHERE user_id = '98765432-e89b-12d3-a456-426655440000';

UPDATE clicks SET click_time = '2022-02-15 09:30:00', user_id = 'e98744e0-f157-4d63-9f57-32eddc879669' WHERE click_id = 'f4fab971-418c-4c2e-b3a7-7fa42b29119f';
UPDATE link_clicks SET click_timestamp = '2022-01-15 12:30:00' WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE referrals SET referral_url = 'https://www.newurl.com' WHERE id = 3;
UPDATE link_clicks SET user_id = 1001 WHERE referral_id = 2001;
UPDATE link_shares SET user_id = 2001, share_timestamp = '2022-01-15 10:30:00' WHERE referral_id = 1001;
